review: To start, the issues people are having with the low power issue can be resolved with any usb ac charger like what your phone came with and you can use same cable the stick comes with.  Out of curiosity i took the ac charger from the stick and used it to charge my portable battery.  It took 2-3x longer then it should have.  My guess is Amazon was being cheap and figured thats where they could cut costs.When I bought this I figured it would be like Roku.  I was definitly wrong and i should have known better.  Its meant for PRIME.  It does support everything like Roku but the OS is targeted for you to use Prime so its tougher/not as convienent to do anything else.  If you do have it will be excellent on how its set up.  The system lags a lot.  Sometimes the remote takes a couple clicks to work.  You dont need it be be in direct view of the box which is nice. I get the fact they want you to get prime and upgrade to the fire box and it does make you want to but its annoying. Movie and show rentals arnt cheaper then xbox one or roku. Meh
